tasks.task: Constructing a rope pump for water extraction and irrigation
subtasks: Constructed a wooden casing around the well for protection
Created a PVC pipe for the water distribution system
Made a rope pump with tire pistons and glass bottles for friction reduction
Assembled the pump components including wood bearings and wire connections
Installed a drip irrigation system using Visqueen material
Designed a three-row water distribution system with wooden parts and painted fabric

tasks.task: Operating the pump for agricultural use
subtasks: Activating the leg drive mechanism of the pump
Distributing water to three rows of plants through the irrigation system
Checking and replacing worn tires for pistons
Cleaning the glass bottles used in the pump mechanism
Repairing the wooden components if needed

tasks.task: Accessing clean water for domestic use
subtasks: Using arms or legs to operate the pump
Fetching water quickly from the protected well
Storing and distributing water within the community as a sustainable resource
